The enhanced version of [[Black Secret Technique Machine One Shot]] which doesn't require [[Karasu]]. After making a distraction, Kankurō manoeuvres [[Kuroari]] behind the target, which then opens up its chest and fires out chakra strings that wrap around its intended target. It then pulls the target into its open abdominal cavity. With the victim trapped, scythe like blades appear and reap through one side of the puppet to the other, killing the victim inside.
